name: postmarks
description: Postmarks is a self-hosted bookmark manager with tagging, search, and sharing support. It offers a clean UI to organize web links for personal or team use with privacy-focused architecture.
features: Bookmark management: Save and organize web links with titles, descriptions, and custom metadata.
Tag system: Apply multiple tags to bookmarks for flexible categorization and filtering.
Search functionality: Find bookmarks quickly using full-text search across titles, descriptions, and tags.
Sharing options: Share individual bookmarks or collections with public or private links.
Browser extension: Save bookmarks directly from your browser with one-click integration.
Import and export: Transfer bookmarks from browsers or other services using standard formats.
Clean interface: Minimal, distraction-free UI focuses on quick bookmark access and organization.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted architecture ensures complete control over your bookmark data.
Collections: Group related bookmarks into collections for project-based organization.
Duplicate detection: Automatically identify and prevent duplicate bookmarks.
Archive mode: Save full webpage content for offline access and preservation.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage bookmarks from any device with an optimized interface.
